Rt. Hon Theresa May, MP

Secretary of State for the Home Office

2 Marsham St

London SW1P 4DF



Dear Ms May


Re: Gladys Mabvira- Forced removal on 22nd September HO Ref: M1279585/3

.

Gladys was and is still an activate member of ZAPU and is affiliated to a branch in the west midlands attending all meetings even having a blog campaigning about the in justice of the Mugabe Regime. All this puts her in great danger if returned to Zimbabwe.

Gladys has lived in the UK for almost nine years now. She has been welcomed by her community, offered sanctuary by her church.

I urge you to use your powers as Home Secretary to put a halt to this removal, to review Gladys's case and grant her sanctuary to live in peace in the UK.
She is detained at:
Yarl's Wood IRC
Twinwoods Road
Clapham




Yours sincerely,

Name: TANYA MPOFU
Address: 69 AUDEN COURT

City: SOUTH STAFFORDSHIRE
Postcode: WV6 7QF
